name: FIND YOUR WINGS DEMO
description:
Play through the first stage of this amazing and for the lack of a better word, perfect, roguelike shooter tower-defense combination called FIND YOUR WINGS!

Buy items, pick modifiers and know what it's like to find your wings!

This is only a demo, but the full version includes:

  • Many more items
  • More modifiers
  • All stages
  • Unique wings to collect
  • Freeplay mode
